text:
Hi fellow HubSpot Developers :wave: Today I have a simple question:
Where can I see in HubSpot if a mail for a forms' recipient has actually been generated? I cannot find anything more than the "submissions" on the form page, which show the submitted form data and the form submitter. But there is no information about the recipient! Is there somekind of e.g. a mailserver log to check if actually a mail has been generated and sent by HubSpot? I searched the web and this slack channel for answers, but sometimes answers seem to be more complicated than questions, if they even exist.
Maybe you can share more insights on this! Thank you.
I would assume the log exists on the contact record that submitted the form.  Have you checked the activity feed around the date of the form submission?

Hi everyone,
We do monthly maintenance for our WordPress clients -- things like plugin updates (we don't let them update automatically because we prefer to check for collisions immediately rather than risk a call from the client asking what happened), server performance report review, vulnerability report review, etc. HubSpot covers a lot of this automatically, but we'd like to make sure we're covering all the bases with our HS clients as well. For those of you who do "scheduled maintenance" on your sites, what do you do?

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

Hi there. I have a question on uploading HubSpot form to Wordpress page if anyone is open to sharing help?<https://www.loom.com/share/da042dea3aac447e9ef4d80d21eec75e?sid=52c60dfe-1dc1-444d-b846-67534e9532c7>
Hello, everyone! I'm beginner in HubSpot Academy. I have learned about CMS Developers.
I'm from Brazil, and I'm excited to learn about this CRM and look forward to job opportunities in this area.
Prazer! My wife is Brazilian and I have a partner agency in Adamantina, Brazil - reach out if you have any quesitons. Where is Brazil are you located?

Oh, nice! I'm live in Rio de Janeiro.

It's always good and relevant for me to get a help and network, I will definitely keep in touch with you and everyone, thank you.

I'm studying Systems Analysis and Development in the fourth period, I graduate at the end of this year.

I have previous experience with programming languages: Python, Java, NodeJs.

I take courses at Cisco (Cybersecurity, Computer Networks, etc) and Data Science.
That's very cool - thanks for sharing!
